{{cpp/coroutine/generator/title|operator{{=}}}}
{{cpp/coroutine/generator/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|1=
generator&amp; operator=( generator other ) noexcept;
}}

Replaces the contents of the generator object. Equivalent to:

{{box|
{{c/core|std::}}{{ltt|cpp/utility/swap}}{{c/core|(}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|coroutine_}}{{tt|,}}{{nbspt}}{{c/core|other.}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|coroutine_}}{{c/core|);}}&lt;br&gt;
{{c/core|std::}}{{ltt|cpp/utility/swap}}{{c/core|(}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|active_}}{{tt|,}}{{nbspt}}{{c/core|other.}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|active_}}{{c/core|);}}
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|another generator to be moved from}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}

===Complexity===
{{todo}}

===Notes===
Iterators previously obtained from {{c|other}} are not invalidated &amp;ndash; they become iterators into {{c|*this}}.

This assignment operator is technically a [[cpp/language/copy_assignment|copy assignment operator]], although {{tt|std::generator}} is only move assignable.
